sentences.sContent: There have been various wagers on certain candidates since the senator announced his retirement.
sentences.sCn: 自从那位参议员宣布引退之后，对某些候选人的打赌猜测纷纷出现。

trans.tranOther: an agreement in which you win or lose money according to the result of something such as a race
to agree to win or lose an amount of money on the result of something such as a race
